iwork.patchpanel
Class TimerMan

java.lang.Object
  iwork.patchpanel.TimerMan
public class TimerMan
extends java.lang.Object

This Timer Manager class handles setting and canceling of timers, and sending out of timer elapsed events.

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
 int cancelTimer(java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String timerName)
          Cancels the named timer.
 java.lang.String getAllTimers()
          Returns a string representing the names and values of all timers, in the following tab-delimited format: timerName1 (tab) timerName2 (tab) etc.
 int setTimer(java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String timerName, long delay)
          Adds a new TimerTask to the timerHash hashtable, or changes the value of the existing one.

Constructor Detail

TimerMan

public TimerMan(Intermediary intermediary)
Method Detail

getAllTimers

public java.lang.String getAllTimers()
Returns a string representing the names and values of all timers, in the following tab-delimited format: timerName1 (tab) timerName2 (tab) etc.

Returns:
the string of variables, or null on failure.

setTimer

public int setTimer(java.lang.String groupName,
                    java.lang.String timerName,
                    long delay)
Adds a new TimerTask to the timerHash hashtable, or changes the value of the existing one.

Parameters:
groupName - the name of the program in which the timer exists
timerName - the timer name (name should be unique within its program)
delay - the delay in milliseconds
Returns:
0 on success. -1 on failure

cancelTimer

public int cancelTimer(java.lang.String groupName,
                       java.lang.String timerName)
Cancels the named timer.

Parameters:
groupName - the name of the program in which the timer exists
timerName - the timer name (name should be unique within its program)
Returns:
0 on success (timer exists with given name) -1 on failure (no such timer exists)
